overview: Ignaz Wuzel and Gerhard Jeschko are regulars at the espresso in the SÃ¼dtiroler Platz underground station. Warden Leopold Prinz knows the problems of the children from Karlsplatz. In 1993, Elizabeth T. Spira filmed people on the Vienna subway network. Above all, it is the desperate, the lost and the forgotten who find refuge and a home in and around the subway.
title: Alltagsgeschichte: Treffpunkt U-Bahn
